Your Account.title: What do I do if I forget my password?
Your Account.content: You can reset your password by clicking on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. You'll receive an email with instructions to create a new password.

Your Account.title: What are the technical requirements for TS?
Your Account.content: TakeSpase works on most modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. You'll need a stable internet connection and at least 2GB of RAM.

Your Account.title: What should I do if I forget my username?
Your Account.content: If you've forgotten your username, you can use your email address to log in instead. You can also contact support to recover your username.

Your Account.title: How do I change my password?
Your Account.content: Go to your account settings and click on 'Change Password'. You'll need to enter your current password and then create a new one.

Your Account.title: How do I get an account for the TS app?
Your Account.content: You can create an account by visiting our website and clicking 'Sign Up'. You'll need to provide your email address and create a password.

Your Account.title: How can I change my profile icon?
Your Account.content: In your profile settings, click on your current profile picture and upload a new image. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and GIF.

Your Account.title: Why can't I sign in?
Your Account.content: Check that you're using the correct email and password. If you're still having trouble, try resetting your password or contact support.

Your Account.title: How do I contact technical support?
Your Account.content: You can contact our technical support team through the help center, by email, or by using the contact form on our website.

Your Account.title: How do I update my email address?
Your Account.content: Go to your account settings and click on 'Edit Profile'. You can change your email address there, but you'll need to verify the new email.

Your Account.title: What are the system requirements?
Your Account.content: TakeSpase requires a modern web browser, stable internet connection, and at least 2GB of RAM. For optimal performance, we recommend 4GB or more.

Your Account.title: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
Your Account.content: In your security settings, you can enable two-factor authentication. You'll need to download an authenticator app and scan a QR code.

Your Account.title: How do I export my data?
Your Account.content: You can export your data by going to your account settings and clicking 'Export Data'. This will download all your information in a ZIP file.

Your Account.title: How do I delete my account?
Your Account.content: To delete your account, go to your account settings and click 'Delete Account'. Please note that this action cannot be undone.

Your Account.title: How do I change my notification settings?
Your Account.content: You can manage your notification preferences in your account settings under the 'Notifications' tab. You can choose which types of notifications to receive.

Your Account.title: How do I manage my privacy settings?
Your Account.content: Your privacy settings can be found in your account settings. You can control who can see your profile and what information is shared.

Your Account.title: How do I report a bug?
Your Account.content: You can report bugs by using the 'Report Issue' feature in the help center or by contacting our support team directly.

Learning.title: How do I start a new lesson?
Learning.content: To start a new lesson, navigate to the learning section and click on the lesson you want to begin. You can also use the search function to find specific topics.

Learning.title: How do I track my progress?
Learning.content: Your progress is automatically tracked as you complete lessons and quizzes. You can view your progress in the analytics section of your dashboard.

Learning.title: How do I access my learning materials?
Learning.content: All your learning materials are available in the learning section. You can filter by subject, difficulty level, or search for specific topics.

Learning.title: How do I take quizzes?
Learning.content: Quizzes are available at the end of each lesson. Click on the quiz to start, and you can review your answers before submitting.

Learning.title: How do I review completed lessons?
Learning.content: You can review completed lessons by going to your learning history. This allows you to revisit content and refresh your knowledge.

Analytics.title: How do I view my learning analytics?
Analytics.content: Your learning analytics are available in the analytics section. You can view detailed reports on your progress, time spent, and performance.

Analytics.title: How do I understand my progress charts?
Analytics.content: Progress charts show your learning journey over time. Green indicates improvement, yellow shows steady progress, and red may indicate areas needing attention.

Analytics.title: How do I export my analytics data?
Analytics.content: You can export your analytics data by clicking the 'Export' button in the analytics section. This will download your data in CSV format.

Analytics.title: How do I compare my performance?
Analytics.content: The analytics section allows you to compare your performance across different subjects and time periods. You can also compare with class averages.

Personal data.title: How do I update my personal information?
Personal data.content: You can update your personal information in your account settings. Click on 'Edit Profile' to make changes to your name, email, or other details.

Personal data.title: How do I manage my privacy settings?
Personal data.content: Privacy settings are located in your account settings. You can control who can see your profile and what information is shared with others.

Personal data.title: How do I download my data?
Personal data.content: You can download your personal data by going to your account settings and clicking 'Download Data'. This will include all your information in a readable format.

Personal data.title: How do I delete my personal data?
Personal data.content: To delete your personal data, go to your account settings and click 'Delete Data'. You can choose which specific data to delete.

Teachers.title: How do I contact my teachers?
Teachers.content: You can contact your teachers through the messaging system in the platform. Go to the teachers section and click on the teacher you want to message.

Teachers.title: How do I view teacher profiles?
Teachers.content: Teacher profiles are available in the teachers section. You can view their qualifications, subjects taught, and contact information.

Teachers.title: How do I schedule sessions with teachers?
Teachers.content: You can schedule sessions with teachers by going to the booking section. Select the teacher, choose a time slot, and confirm your booking.

Teachers.title: How do I provide feedback to teachers?
Teachers.content: After each session, you can provide feedback through the rating system. You can also leave detailed comments about your experience.

Family Members.title: How do I add family members?
Family Members.content: You can add family members in your account settings under the 'Family' section. You'll need their email address to send them an invitation.

Family Members.title: How do I manage family member access?
Family Members.content: Family member access can be managed in your account settings. You can control what information they can see and what actions they can take.

Family Members.title: How do I view family member progress?
Family Members.content: You can view family member progress in the family section. This shows their learning activities and achievements.

Family Members.title: How do I set up parental controls?
Family Members.content: Parental controls can be set up in your account settings. You can restrict access to certain features and set time limits.

Classroom & School.title: How do I join a classroom?
Classroom & School.content: To join a classroom, you'll need an invitation code from your teacher. Enter the code in the 'Join Classroom' section to get started.

Classroom & School.title: How do I view school announcements?
Classroom & School.content: School announcements are displayed in the classroom section. You can also receive notifications when new announcements are posted.

Classroom & School.title: How do I access school resources?
Classroom & School.content: School resources are available in the classroom section. You can browse by subject or search for specific materials.

Classroom & School.title: How do I communicate with classmates?
Classroom & School.content: You can communicate with classmates through the messaging system. Go to the classroom section and click on the messaging tab.

Integrations.title: How do I connect third-party apps?
Integrations.content: You can connect third-party apps in the integrations section. Click on the app you want to connect and follow the authorization process.

Integrations.title: How do I sync with Google Classroom?
Integrations.content: To sync with Google Classroom, go to the integrations section and click on Google Classroom. You'll need to authorize the connection.

Integrations.title: How do I integrate with Zoom?
Integrations.content: Zoom integration can be set up in the integrations section. You'll need to provide your Zoom account credentials.

Integrations.title: How do I connect my calendar?
Integrations.content: You can connect your calendar in the integrations section. This will sync your learning sessions with your personal calendar.
